mapper.select: SELECT c.*, m.name FROM clan c, member m WHERE c.clan_master_code = m.member_code

select c_m.clan_member_code, c_m.state, m.name, m.score, m.record, m.win, m.lose, m.draw, m.rate, c.clan_master_code from clan_member c_m, member m, clan c where c_m.clan_code = #{clan_code} and c_m.member_code = m.member_code and c_m.clan_code = c.clan_code and c_m.state is null

select c_m.clan_member_code, c_m.state, m.name, m.score, m.record, m.win, m.lose, m.draw, m.rate, c.clan_master_code from clan_member c_m, member m, clan c where c_m.clan_code = #{clan_code} and c_m.member_code = m.member_code and c_m.clan_code = c.clan_code and c_m.state = 1
SELECT c.clan_code, c_m.member_code FROM clan c, clan_member c_m WHERE c_m.clan_member_code = #{clan_member_code} AND c.clan_code = c_m.clan_code
